channel.title: Info on Tiamo Pastoor | Books
channel.description: Recent content in Info on Tiamo Pastoor | Books

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Tiamo Pastoor. On this page, I will explain a bit about myself and my work as an author. The route to getting here has been a weird one, to say the least.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Want to get in touch? Well, how you do that depends a little on why you want to get in touch. Email Whenever in doubt, your best bet is to mail me!

item.title: Support
item.description: Most of my work is completely free and accessible to anyone. In fact, I made a promise long ago to never use ads, or require accounts, or do any other (nasty) tricks.
